greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximal run length in base-9 representation of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..66430
program: (PARI) A043283(n, b=9)={my(m, c=1); while(n>0, n%b==(n\=b)%b && c++ && next; m=max(m, c); c=1); m} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 23 2013
xref: Cf. A043276-A043290 for base-2 to base-16 analogs.
Cf. A002452 (gives the positions of records, the first occurrence of each n).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
